So, in this chapter, the differences betwn "Server-first" and "Client-first" architecture is discussed.

Benefits and drawbacks on both these methods is described.

Then, a "hybrid" approach is presented. In this approach, some pages will be rendered entirely by Django, and some others will be offloaded to React.

Rendering happens on a page by page basis so this approach is actually called _*Hybrid-pages*_ approach.
